local_intent: Perceive white_plate, complete approach-and-align, perform pick using prior grasp key, and verify object in gripper.
assumptions: ComputeGraspPose has previously written 'white_plate_grasp' to the blackboard
White plate is reachable and visible from the current pose
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT steps: detect (with retries), approach/align (tolerance 0.005), pick using 'white_plate_grasp', then verify ObjectInGripper; uses binned timeout values consistent with GLOBAL_BT.
